testcase.brief: (IxPort: CoF=3) Static mac entry and dynamic learning mac entry conflict, check the priority for static entry and dynamic entry
testcase.description:
Topology to use PC3 + + PC1+++++Switch(access) ++++PC2 Description Static mac entry and dynamic learning mac entry conflict, check the priority for static entry and dynamic entry Platform Dependence Chesapeake Pre-condition ? FDB table size doesn’t exceed ? PC1 connect to switch access port1, pvid 10 ? PC2 connect to switch access port2, pvid 10 ? Switch access ports are with learning/forwarding state Test procedure Create static fdb enry first, then dynamic learn the mac entry 1. Create a static mac entry, such as [0011-1111-1111, vlan 10, port1] 2. PC1 send unicast frames with src mac 0011-1111-1111 Result1 3. Set PC1 to capture frames 4. PC2 send a unicast frames to PC1 with dst mac 0011-1111-1111 Result2
Dynamic learn mac entry first, then create the same static mac entry 5. Clear the FDB table 6. PC1 send unicast frames with src mac 0011-1111-1111 Result3 7. Create a static mac entry for switch, such as [0011-1111-1111, vlan 10, port1] Result4 8. PC2 send a unicast frames to PC1 with dst mac 0011-1111-1111 Result5
9. Check the mac address table, or reboot the switch to see if it is the static mac entry Result6 Expect result Result1: dynamic entry should not be created Result2: PC1 should receive the frames sent by PC2, and the traffic should follow the static entry Result3: create a dynamic mac entry[0011-1111-1111, vlan10,port1] Result4: created static mac entry success, the static mac entry override the same dynamic mac entry Result5: PC1 should receive the frames sent by PC2, and the traffic should follow the static entry Result6: it’s the static mac entry

step.desc: configure three access ports in same vlans, port1, port2 and port3
step.telnet: -v "vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port1} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port2} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port3} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "show vlan brief" -v "show vlan summary" -v "show vlan id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "show mac-address-table all" -v "show interface"

step.desc: create a static mac-addr entry first
dynamic entry of mac-addr ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} shouldn't be created
port2 sends pkts with src-mac ${sw1.port2.ixia_port.mac} to dst-mac ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac}
analyse statistics on rxport, only port2 received pkt from port3
port1 sends pkt with src-mac ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} in vlan${tb.vlan1}
step.ssh:
-v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -def disable -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port},${sw1.port4.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.phytype},${sw1.port2.phytype},${sw1.port3.phytype},${sw1.port4.phytype}" -v "" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable"
-v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -mac_dst ffff.ffff.ffff -mac_src ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} -eth2_protocol 0x0800 -udf_offset 34 -patternOffset2 34" -v ""
-v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -rxPortList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "ctrl-c"

step.desc: check FDB adds the entry of mac-addr ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac}
create static mac entry ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} on port3, check it will override the dynamic one
port2 sends pkts with src-mac ${sw1.port2.ixia_port.mac} to dst-mac ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac}, only port3 receives pkt
step.ssh:
-v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -def disable -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port},${sw1.port4.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.phytype},${sw1.port2.phytype},${sw1.port3.phytype},${sw1.port4.phytype}" -v "" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable"
-v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -mac_dst ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} -mac_src ${sw1.port2.ixia_port.mac} -eth2_protocol 0x0800 -udf_offset 34 -patternOffset2 34" -v ""
-v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -rxPortList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "ctrl-c"

step.desc: analyse statistics on rxport, only port2 received pkt from port3
